entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-11-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Please add a method to C# standard library to send deleted files to recycle bin #62114
  • [API Proposal]: Add ZlibEncoder and ZlibDecoder to System.IO.Compression. #62113
  • [API Proposal]: Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.Binder: Allow optional overwriting existing mutable collection instances #62112
  • Further Bound Checking Improvements #62111
  • ArgumentOutOfRangeException at System.Net.Security.SslStream.ProcessBlob #62109
  • Assertion failed '(info.compCompHnd->getClassAttribs(fldCls) & CORINFO_FLG_VALUECLASS) == 0' during 'Do value numbering' #62108
    .NET 7.0
  • Consider consolidating Antigen/Fuzzlyn pipeline #62107
  • Request for hardware based rng, and integration with vector struct. #62110
  • Start using the Regex source generator in this repo #62105
  • capturing groups in .NET lookbehind assertions are greedier than their prefixes, unlike other engines #62104
  • fsharp code gives incorrect result in .NET 6 when compiled in release. #62103

Closed

  • System.Runtime.CompilerServices.Unsafe.dll is missing building runtime/libs with VS2022 #62064

PullRequests

Created

  • Always use int3/bkpt #62106
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Updated

  • Fix mono alc from gchandle #62120
    area-AssemblyLoader-mono, community-contribution
  • Fix a few syntax issues in shell scripts #62102
  • [Wasm] JS modularization #61313
    arch-wasm, 7.0.0
  • Expose Comment in ZipArchive and ZipArchiveEntry #59442
    area-System.IO.Compression, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] [HTTP] Scavange fix #62008
    area-System.Net.Http
  • test #62116
    NO REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [WIP] #61971 - Fix a bug causing EventCounter to fire twice on linux #62047
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, community-contribution
  • S.IO.StringReader: Use ReadOnlySpan.IndexOfAny in ReadLine() for performance #60463
    area-System.IO, tenet-performance, community-contribution
  • Fix XmlSchema does not correctly validate xs:NMTOKENS type restrictions with enumeration #60544
    area-System.Xml, community-contribution
  • [JIT] [Issue: 61620] Optimizing ARM64 for *x = dblCns; #61847
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Delete `GT_SIMD_CHK` and `GT_HW_INTRINSIC_CHK` #62088
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • WIP: first group project for type generator tests 0-99 #61942
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Add parser tests from nim-regex #62093
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • needLabel assert #62025
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Update DI external tests for Stashbox #61928
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, community-contribution
  • make sure OpenSSL is initialized before Tls13Supported code runs #62037
    area-System.Net.Security, os-linux
